message:
http://commoncrawl.org/
Common Crawl is a non-profit with the goal of democratizing access to web information by producing and maintaining an open repository of web crawl data that is universally accessible and analyzable.
Common Crawl produces and maintains a repository of web crawl data that is openly accessible to everyone. The crawl currently covers 6 billion pages and the repository includes valuable metadata.
Their 2013 dataset is 102TB in size (81TB compressed).
name: CommonCrawl
caption: commoncrawl.org
